entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning in the evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
